column5: SBGL Wall Street clearly didnt think 1 SBGL would get the strike resolved and 2 They would seal the deal with Lonmin Both events have occurred Price has gone from 505 to 323 in 3 months At 367 this is going to see 4 very soon as they also have resolved all near term debt issues and there is huge short interest GLD PALL and SLV continue to move higher
